definition: A term used to describe a peak or record-breaking level that has never been reached before in a particular context, often associated with financial markets, stock prices, or economic indicators. It signifies the highest point ever achieved in a specific category or domain.

examples.german: Das Unternehmen erreichte ein Allzeithoch an der BÃ¶rse.
examples.english: The company reached an all-time high on the stock market.

examples.german: Der Aktienkurs erreichte ein neues Allzeithoch.
examples.english: The stock price reached a new all-time high.

examples.german: Der Verkaufsrekord stellt ein Allzeithoch dar.
examples.english: The sales record represents an all-time high.

examples.german: Die Arbeitslosenquote ist auf ein Allzeithoch gestiegen.
examples.english: The unemployment rate has reached an all-time high.
